wikitext.*:
'''BAL''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "powerful, mighty, have power".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 149 (appearing as "√BAL")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Common Eldarin]]/[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''bálā'', ''bal-ī''<ref group="note">The "ī" also has an [[Wikipedia:Acute accent|acute accent]]. Cf. {{VT|45a}}, p. 7.</ref> ("Power, God")<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 350 (root appearing as "BAL-")</ref>
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[Valar|Vala]]''<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Telerin]]: ''Bala''<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''Bala''<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''[[Balan]]''<ref name=Ety/>
